name: VAR_CONTACT
description: This table contains the contact specific information for each variance record.

columns.name: VARIANCE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the variance record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The internal contact date for this variance record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: IMPACT_C_NAME
columns.description: The impact rating for this variance contact.

columns.name: LAST_UPD_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user to last update this contact.

columns.name: LAST_UPD_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LAST_UPDATE_TIME
columns.description: The instance this contact was last updated.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: Contact number for the variance contact.

columns.name: READING_CAREPLAN_CSN_ID
columns.description: Links to the care plan contact that this variance was documented under

columns.name: VARIANCE_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment added to a variance on a care plan.
